name: Juche bracelet
description:
One of 12 drawings of jewelry inspired by different political emblems. 
This specific one depicts a bracelet in the shape of the North Korean Juche emblem.
This piece is part of a series of videos, objects and audios that reflected on different kinds of envy and ugly feeling's social and 
psychological implications.

The original drawings where displayed at a physical solo show called Hueco, held at Constitución gallery last year. 

This is one of many NFTs regarding that exhibition that will be minted during 2021.
